title: What the -actual- fuck is with the Matchmaking?
body:
I thought for the longest that the complaints regarding Rito's matchmaking wasn't justified, but then I saw it firsthand. How the hell do I, a new Gold 5 (with G5 MMR) end up in games pitted against players who are level 25-28?

I assumed when I saw "unranked" that they simply didn't play Ranked, but upon further inspection, they don't play ranked 
**because they aren't high enough of a level to EVEN DO SO yet**. Why the actual fuck is this happening? 

I don't like roflstomping new players because the matchmaking system decides to hand me some inherent advantage; that's outright stupid and unfair TO THEM especially. The **NEW PLAYER EXPERIENCE** is already downright awful, and this only **exacerbates** the issue.

--------------------------------------------------------

TL;DR - New Player Experience *still* sucks. Matchmaking is a mess.
